bow: what are your must have baby items that lot of new moms would think of curious about the unique things you would read about in new moms book things that parents have discovered through experience aquaphor it works for literally everything nosefrida the snot sucker way better than the traditional nasal aspirator milkies it definitely not essential and ve heard of women just holding cup under their non nursing boob but if you have 20 to blow get milkies you just slip it in your bra and it catches the milk that comes out during the first month or so when your supply is still regulating was able to freeze about 12 oz per day by using one under eye concealer seriously it will likely be the only makeup you have time to put on and it will make you look like you did get up exactly 18 times to feed the baby the night before baby swaddler thing because babies love to flare their arms out when they hear tiny noise from across the room which then wakes them up and then you start the long process of putting them back to bed all over again plus you can look at your tiny baby burrito and marvel at how adorable they are nosefrida swaddle pods like swaddle blanket but it tight bag that zips them in so much easier booger tweezers oh wow did even know this existed that awesome will get this for the next baby because the amount of breastmilk that got onto my boppy was just insane really good baby carrier not baby bjorn so true this was lifesaver when baby got her first runny nose like medela brand anything but really loved their steam bags for disinfecting bottles while was still pumping if you are good at keeping track of time there little timer called an izbin that labeled for diaper changes feeding and naps forget those fold out changing pads they tend to be tiny get one of those throw sized blankets that make for camping picnics that roll up and secure with strap it been awhile since my kids were that little but pretty sure baby bjorns are lot better than they used to be lingerie bag to put baby socks in when you wash them in the washing machine they are so tiny that they would get stuck in the drain otherwise how cool it simple but such great idea bjorn style carries offer baby no support and can easily lead to hip dislocation here good article with all the info http www megganmamma com 2013 11 01 why id never put my baby in baby bjorn carrier ergo baby or moby style carriers are much better have an ergo and bjorn that has lower back support panel the ergo wins if an wearing my lo for more than an hour and we are going lots of places in the car otherwise the bjorn wins every time it easy comfy enough and my kid loses her shit sometimes if she ca face forward like to upgrade my ergo to the forward facing one but at months it seems little spendy this got some as gift and still use them for the kiddo socks years later spray bottle of water poop wipes off much easier if you give the bum nice spray first was gifted one of this from my sil my pregnant self wants to puke anytime think about using it but she assures me that when my babies are stuffed up and ca eat ll do anything to help them out we will see never would have thought of this that great idea also by the same company the windi helps relieve gas but that what mean pretty sure they ve added that support in recent years know ve seen one with waist support that mine did have when my kids were little know for the first week was stuffing burp cloths in my bra and it would still leak through to my clothes got one at my baby shower also thought it was gross also but it
